1 var PacketReader = require('../PacketReader'),
  2   PacketWriter = require('../PacketWriter'),
  3   GetDbParameterPacket = require('../GetDbParameterPacket'),
  4   CAS = require('../../constants/CASConstants'),
  5   assert = require('assert');
  6 
  7 function testGetDbParameter() {
  8   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
  9   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
 10   var options =
 11   {
 12     casInfo   : [0, 255, 255, 255],
 13     parameter : CAS.CCIDbParam.CCI_PARAM_MAX_STRING_LENGTH
 14   };
 15   var getDbParameterPacket = new GetDbParameterPacket(options);
 16 
 17   getDbParameterPacket.write(packetWriter);
 18   assert.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[3], 9); //total length
 19   assert.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[8], 4);
 20   assert.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[12], CAS.CASFunctionCode.CAS_FC_GET_DB_PARAMETER);
 21   assert.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[16], CAS.CCIDbParam.CCI_PARAM_MAX_STRING_LENGTH);
 22 
 23   packetReader.write(new Buffer([0, 0, 0, 0,
 24                                  0, 255, 255, 255,
 25                                  0, 0, 0, 0,
 26                                  0, 0, 0, 99]));
 27   getDbParameterPacket.parse(packetReader);
 28 
 29   assert.equal(getDbParameterPacket.casInfo[0], 0); //casInfo
 30   assert.equal(getDbParameterPacket.casInfo[1], 255); //casInfo
 31   assert.equal(getDbParameterPacket.casInfo[2], 255); //casInfo
 32   assert.equal(getDbParameterPacket.casInfo[3], 255); //casInfo
 33 
 34   assert.equal(getDbParameterPacket.responseCode, 0);
 35   assert.equal(getDbParameterPacket.errorCode, 0);
 36   assert.equal(getDbParameterPacket.errorMsg, '');
 37 
 38   assert.equal(getDbParameterPacket.value, 99);
 39 }
 40 
 41 console.log('Unit test ' + module.filename.toString() + ' started...');
 42 testGetDbParameter();
 43 console.log('Unit test ended OK.');
 44
